Package ohos.telephony

Class SimInfoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.telephony.SimInfoManager

  • public class SimInfoManager
extends Object
    Provides applications with APIs for obtaining SIM card status, card file information, and card specifications. SIM cards include SIM, USIM, and CSIM cards.

    This class is a singleton class. Applications can use the getInstance method to obtain an instance and then use the instance to invoke the method for obtaining SIM card information.

    Since:
    1

        Obtains an instance of SimInfoManager.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the context of the application.
        Returns:
        Returns the instance of SimInfoManager.
        Since:

      • isSupportMultiSim

        public boolean isSupportMultiSim​()
        Checks whether the device supports multiple SIM cards, that is, whether there are multiple card slots.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the device supports multiple SIM cards; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getMaxSimCount

        public int getMaxSimCount​()
        Obtains the maximum number of SIM cards that can be used simultaneously on the device, that is, the maximum number of SIM card slots.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum number of SIM card slots.
        Since:
        1

      • getIsoCountryCodeForSim

        public String getIsoCountryCodeForSim​(int slotId)
        Obtains the ISO country code of the SIM card in a specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the country code defined in ISO 3166-2; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimOperatorNumeric

        public String getSimOperatorNumeric​(int slotId)
        Obtains the home PLMN number of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        The value is recorded in the SIM card and is irrelevant to the network with which the SIM card is currently registered.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the PLMN number; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimSpn

        public String getSimSpn​(int slotId)
        Obtains the service provider name (SPN) of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        The value is recorded in the EFSPN file of the SIM card and is irrelevant to the network with which the SIM card is currently registered.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the SPN; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted or no EFSPN file in the SIM card.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimIccId

        public String getSimIccId​(int slotId)
        Obtains the ICCID of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        The ICCID is a unique identifier of a SIM card. It consists of 20 digits and is recorded in the EFICCID file of the SIM card.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the ICCID; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimTelephoneNumber

        public String getSimTelephoneNumber​(int slotId)
        Obtains the MSISDN of the SIM card in a specified slot. The MSISDN is recorded in the EFMSISDN file of the SIM card.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the MSISDN; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted or no MSISDN is recorded in the EFMSISDN file.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimGid1

        public String getSimGid1​(int slotId)
        Obtains the Group Identifier Level 1 (GID1) of the SIM card in a specified slot. The GID1 is recorded in the EFGID1 file of the SIM card.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the GID1; returns an empty string if no SIM card is inserted or no GID1 in the SIM card.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimState

        public int getSimState​(int slotId)
        Obtains the state of the SIM card in a specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns one of the following SIM card states:
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_UNKNOWN
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_NOT_PRESENT
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_LOCKED
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_NOT_READY
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_READY
        • TelephonyConstants#SIM_STATE_LOADED
        Since:
        1

      • hasSimCard

        public boolean hasSimCard​(int slotId)
        Checks whether a SIM card is inserted in a specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a SIM card is inserted; return false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getSimTeleNumberIdentifier

        public String getSimTeleNumberIdentifier​(int slotId)
        Obtains the alpha identifier of the phone number of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        Only applications with the ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE permission can call this method.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the alpha identifier of the phone number; returns an empty string if no phone number alpha identifier is written into the SIM card.
        Since:
        3

      • getVoiceMailNumber

        public String getVoiceMailNumber​(int slotId)
        Obtains the voice mailbox number of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        Only applications with the ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE permission can call this method.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the voice mailbox number; returns an empty string if no voice mailbox number is written into the SIM card.
        Since:
        3

      • getVoiceMailCount

        public int getVoiceMailCount​(int slotId)
        Obtains the number of messages in the voice mailbox of the SIM card in the specified slot.

        Only applications with the ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE permission can call this method.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of messages in the voice mailbox.
        Since:
        3

      • getVoiceMailIdentifier

        public String getVoiceMailIdentifier​(int slotId)
        Obtains the alpha identifier of the voice mailbox of the SIM card in a specified slot.

        Only applications with the ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE permission can call this method.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns the voice mailbox alpha identifier; returns an empty string if no voice mailbox alpha identifier is written into the SIM card.
        Since:
        3

      • isSimActive

        public boolean isSimActive​(int slotId)
        Checks whether the SIM card in a specified slot is activated.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the card slot index number, ranging from 0 to the maximum card slot index number supported by the device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the SIM card is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getDefaultVoiceSlotId

        public int getDefaultVoiceSlotId​()
        Obtains the default card slot for the voice service.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if card 1 is used as the default card slot for the voice service; returns 1 if card 2 is used as the default card slot for the voice service; returns -1 if no card is available for the voice service.
        Since:
        3

      • hasOperatorPrivileges

        public boolean hasOperatorPrivileges​(int slotId)
        Checks whether your application (the caller) has been granted the operator permissions.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the ID of the SIM card slot.
        Returns:
        Returns true if your application has been granted the operator permissions; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4
